required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Carotid Stenting in Patients With High Risk Carotid Stenosis ("Soft Plaque")
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Trial of Proximal-versus Distal Cerebral Protection on Micro Embolization During Carotid Artery Stenting in Patients With High Risk Lipid Palque

brief_summary.textblock: Stenting is an alternative to traditional surgery in the treatment of carotid stenosis.The intra and/or postprocedural cerebral embolization remains the most frequent complication. Thanks to the systematic use of cerebral protection systems, these complications have reduced.A debate concerning which cerebral protective device should be more effective is still ongoing.

primary_outcome.measure: number of Microembolization signals (MES) detected with transcranal doppler
primary_outcome.time_frame: 6 different phases of carotid stenting (lesion wiring; predilation; stent crossing of the lesion; stent deployment; stent post dilation; device tetruieval/deflation

secondary_outcome.description: Assesment of any clinical and neurological complication (death, any stroke, TIA; myocardial infarction).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Carotid stenting with filter wire EZ

intervention.description: The MOMA system is an endovascular catheter for proximal protection during carotid stenting. The system allows a concomitant balloon occlusion of both external and common carotid arteries leading to blood flow reversal within the internal carotid artery.

intervention.intervention_name: Carotid stenting with filter wire EZ
intervention.description: The filter wire EZ a distal protection system that is placed in he distal internal carotid artery before carotid stenting. The filter should entrap almost all the debries that are generated during endovascular procedure. At the end of the procedure the filter is retrieved throught a dedicated retrieval catheter.
intervention.arm_group_label: Carotid stenting with filter wire EZ

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
-patients with monolateral, significant, soft carotid stenosis
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with controlateral carotid occlusion
- patients with critic stenosis of the external carotid
